description:
Play or create your own platformer levels
Play Maker is a traditional platformer. Jump your way through the included levels, or create your own! The game includes over 10 pre-made levels, and plenty more with the online level system, where anyone can upload their creations. There are over 10 unique types of items you can put in your level, including springs, conveyor belts, switches, checkpoints, sound effects, and more! Create level requirements, such as a time limit, maximum number of jumps, and minimum amount of coins.
